content:
Hi! I received my grade for PSET 4 and received lower than I would have thought. I looked at the test cases and was wondering if someone could explain to me what was wrong with my code and what test cases were used because I am still unclear on what I did incorrectly. 

For what I understand, I didn't finish my load data code because I only considered the "close" column and not the other few. This was because I was more focused on the doc string, which specifiied closing prices, than the problem set instructions online, which mentionend all of the columns. I was wondering, however, if this meant that I also lost points for the plotting portions of the problem set because of the incorrect loaded in data from my previous function. 

I was wondering if I would be able to request a regrade for this situation. I just spoke to a TA about this situation who recommended that I post on Piazza.
subject: 6.100A Regrade Request

content: @Kuan Wei Huang This is the student I was initially talking to who hardcoded the load_data function
